description: I am at peace with life,with people and their differences.I live a simple life but also enjoy the finer things. I love music,dancing,am a romantic,,i enjoy endless conversations and am a good listener, i like chatting wth ppl .meet new ppl, make new friends, we can learn so much from each oda...im not hre to find a gf or sex, or a soulmate for that matter.., but i do come here wth an open mind and open heart.., so if sumthng happen., gud.., so be it.., if not,,,, no problem
